item.title: Streaming Data From Database to Shiny
item.description: First, a script that simulate data streaming. It rewrites the table every p second. Here we set it to 1. library(config) library(DBI) library(dplyr) library(purrr) library(tryCatchLog) db <- config::get(config = "some-mysql") # local Docker container conn <- dbConnect( drv = RMySQL::MySQL(), username = db$username, password = db$password, host = db$host, port = db$port, dbname = db$dbname ) stopifnot(DBI::dbRemoveTable(conn, "int_stream")) generate <- function() { data.frame(ind = LETTERS, int = round(rnorm( length(LETTERS), mean = 10, sd = 2 ))) } insert_to_db <- function(p = 1) { stopifnot(dbWriteTable(conn, "int_stream", generate(), overwrite = TRUE)) message(paste("Success:", Sys.
